const ResultContent = (props) => { const tableContent = props.showContent const currentSaving = props.setSaving const dataInvestEmpty = props.data const formatCurrency = new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: 'USD', minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits: 2, }); if (dataInvestEmpty === true) { return
Year Total Savings Interest (Year) Total Interest Invested Capital
YEAR NUMBER TOTAL SAVINGS END OF YEAR INTEREST GAINED IN YEAR TOTAL INTEREST GAINED TOTAL INVESTED CAPITAL
} return ( {tableContent.map((yearData) => ( ))}
Year Total Savings Interest (Year) Total Interest Invested Capital
{yearData.year} {yearData.savingsEndOfYear} {formatCurrency.format(yearData.yearlyInterest)} {yearData.savingsEndOfYear - currentSaving - (yearData.yearlyContribution * yearData.year)} {currentSaving + (yearData.yearlyContribution * yearData.year)}
) } export default ResultContent;
